attributes.action: actively encourage bus-drivers and public transport personnel to be polite
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bus-drivers are morose. When one's bus-pass doesn't work (due to a technical issue that is the fault of the bus company) or because the bus is full and they drive past without even recognising you hailing them. It's rude.

There is nothing to stop the PM from acknowledging the need for politeness amongst those paid out of the public purse, and I see no reason why he shouldn't.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
